hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT nextval(:seqName) as id
SELECT id,profilename FROM profile ORDER BY profilename ASC
SELECT id,gendername FROM gender ORDER BY gendername ASC
SELECT id,gendername FROM gender WHERE id!=:genderId ORDER BY gendername ASC
SELECT id,religionname FROM religion ORDER BY religionname ASC
SELECT id,mothertonque FROM mothertonque ORDER BY mothertonque ASC
SELECT id,rolename FROM role ORDER BY rolename ASC
SELECT id,statusname FROM status ORDER BY statusname ASC
SELECT id,orgname FROM organization ORDER BY orgname ASC
SELECT id,maritalstatusname FROM maritalstatus ORDER BY maritalstatusname ASC
SELECT id,feetinches FROM height ORDER BY feetinches ASC
SELECT id,weight FROM weight ORDER BY weight ASC
SELECT id,education FROM education ORDER BY education ASC
SELECT id,occupation FROM occupation ORDER BY occupation ASC
SELECT id,currency FROM currency ORDER BY currency ASC
SELECT id,countryname FROM country ORDER BY countryname ASC
SELECT id,stateName FROM state ORDER BY stateName ASC
SELECT id,stateName FROM state WHERE countryid =:countryId ORDER BY stateName ASC
SELECT id,cityname FROM city WHERE stateid =:stateId ORDER BY cityname ASC
SELECT id,castename FROM caste WHERE religionid =:religionId ORDER BY castename ASC
SELECT email FROM userprofile
SELECT to_char(expires, 'DD-Mon-YYYY') as validity, discount FROM promotiondetails WHERE promocode =:promoCode

SELECT u.id, u.profileid, u.fullname, u.email, u.password, u.passwordhash, r.rolename, s.statusname, upd.planname, ad.deactivateprofiledays, ad.deactivatedprofiledate , ad.activateprofiledate, ad.isprofileactive, ad.deleteprofilereason, ad.isprofiledeleted, ad.showmyprofilepicture, ad.showmymobilenumber, ad.showmyemailid , ad.verifymobilenumber, ad.verifyemailid, ad.verifyedmobilenumber, ad.verifyedemailid, ad.emailcount, ad.mobilecount, ad.videocallcount, u.religionid, pp.id as partnerpreferenceid, cd.planid, u.mobile , u.genderid FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN partnerpreference pp ON pp.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN roledetails rd ON rd.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN cartdetails cd ON cd.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN upgradeplandetails upd ON upd.id = ad.accounttype LEFT JOIN role r ON r.id = rd.roleid JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE email=:email
SELECT id, profileid FROM partnerpreference WHERE userId=:userId
SELECT id, profileid FROM personaldetails WHERE userId=:userId

SELECT u.id, u.profileid, u.fullname, u.email, u.password, u.passwordhash, r.rolename, s.statusname FROM userprofile u JOIN roledetails rd ON rd.userid = u.id JOIN role r ON r.id = rd.roleid JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE u.id=:userId
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscriberemail=:email AND statusid=:statusId
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE profileid=:profileId AND userid=:userId
SELECT * FROM mailbox WHERE profileid=:profileId AND userid=:userId

SELECT planName, amount, validity, emailCount, mobileCount, videoCallCount, expressInterest, profileHighlight, viewProfile, protectPhoto, getSMSAlert, id FROM upgradeplandetails WHERE planname != 'FREE' ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, e.education, o.occupation, pg.filename, m.accepted, m.notinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM mailbox m JOIN userprofile u ON u.id = m.userid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE m.profileid =:profileId AND m.newmail = TRUE AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY m.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, e.education, o.occupation, pg.filename, m.accepted, m.notinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM mailbox m JOIN userprofile u ON u.profileid = m.profileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE m.userid =:userId AND m.accepted = TRUE AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY m.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, e.education, o.occupation, pg.filename, m.accepted, m.notinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM mailbox m JOIN userprofile u ON u.profileid = m.profileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE m.userid =:userId AND m.notinterested = TRUE AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY m.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, e.education, o.occupation, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM matches m JOIN userprofile u ON u.profileid = m.profileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE m.userid =:userId AND m.sendmail = TRUE AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY m.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid LEFT JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT u.id, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT u.id, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT u.id, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT u.id, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND e.education=:education AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT u.id, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid LEFT JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND e.education=:education AND o.occupation=:occupation AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT u.id, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid LEFT JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND e.education=:education AND o.occupation=:occupation AND c.countryname=:country AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT u.id, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid LEFT JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid LEFT JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND e.education=:education AND o.occupation=:occupation AND c.countryname=:country AND st.statename=:state AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT u.id, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid LEFT JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid LEFT JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid LEFT JOIN city ct ON ct.id = u.cityid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND e.education=:education AND o.occupation=:occupation AND c.countryname=:country AND st.statename=:state AND ct.cityname=:city AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, e.education, o.occupation, pg.filename, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture , p.profilename, ms.maritalstatusname, u.aboutyou FROM matches m JOIN userprofile u ON u.id = m.userid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE m.profileid =:profileId AND u.id !=1 AND m.whoviewedmyprofile = TRUE AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY m.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, m.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM matches m JOIN userprofile u ON u.profileid = m.profileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE m.userid =:userId AND m.viewedandnotcontacted = TRUE AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY m.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, m.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM matches m JOIN userprofile u ON u.profileid = m.profileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE m.userid =:userId AND m.recentlyviewedprofiles = TRUE AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY m.createddate DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid LEFT JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid LEFT JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid LEFT JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:maritalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND e.education=:education AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid LEFT JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND e.education=:education AND o.occupation=:occupation AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid LEFT JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND e.education=:education AND o.occupation=:occupation AND c.countryname=:country AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid LEFT JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid LEFT JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND e.education=:education AND o.occupation=:occupation AND c.countryname=:country AND st.statename=:state AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid LEFT JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid LEFT JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid LEFT JOIN city ct ON ct.id = u.cityid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=:fromHeightId AND u.heightid <=:toHeightId AND ms.maritalstatusname =:marutalStatus AND g.gendername !=:gender AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND r.religionname =:religion AND ca.castename =:caste AND mt.mothertonque=:motherTongue AND e.education=:education AND o.occupation=:occupation AND c.countryname=:country AND st.statename=:state AND ct.cityname=:city AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, o.occupation, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN partnerpreference pp ON pp.userid =:userId LEFT JOIN userprofile up ON up.id =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=pp.fromheightid AND u.heightid <=pp.toheightid AND ms.id =:maritalStatusId AND g.id =:genderId AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND r.id = up.religionid AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, o.occupation, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN partnerpreference pp ON pp.userid =:userId LEFT JOIN userprofile up ON up.id =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=pp.fromheightid AND u.heightid <=pp.toheightid AND ms.id =:maritalStatusId AND g.id =:genderId AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND c.id =:countryId AND st.id =:stateId AND r.id = up.religionid AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, o.occupation, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN partnerpreference pp ON pp.userid =:userId LEFT JOIN userprofile up ON up.id =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=pp.fromheightid AND u.heightid <=pp.toheightid AND ms.id =:maritalStatusId AND g.id =:genderId AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND c.id =:countryId AND r.id = up.religionid AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, o.occupation, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM userprofile u LEFT JOIN partnerpreference pp ON pp.userid =:userId LEFT JOIN userprofile up ON up.id =:userId JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.profileid = u.profileid AND m.userid =:userId LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) >=:fromAge AND date_part('year', AGE(u.dob)) <=:toAge AND u.heightid >=pp.fromheightid AND u.heightid <=pp.toheightid AND ms.id =:maritalStatusId AND g.id =:genderId AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND st.id =:stateId AND r.id = up.religionid AND u.id !=:userId AND u.id !=1 AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY u.createddate DESC

SELECT u.id, u.fullname, m.profileid, p.profilename, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, ms.maritalstatusname, c.countryname, e.education, pg.filename, u.aboutyou, m.shortlistedprofiles, m.sendinterested, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM matches m JOIN userprofile u ON u.profileid = m.profileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE m.userid =:userId AND m.shortlistedprofiles = TRUE AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY m.createddate DESC

SELECT m.userid, u.profileid, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, h.feetinches, r.religionname, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM matches m JOIN userprofile u ON u.id = m.userid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid LEFT JOIN photogallery pg ON pg.id = u.profilepictureid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid = u.id JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid WHERE m.profileid =:profileId AND u.id !=1 AND m.whoviewedmyprofile = TRUE AND s.statusname = 'ACTIVE' AND ad.isprofileactive = TRUE ORDER BY m.createddate DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT u.profileid, p.profilename, u.fullname, g.gendername, ms.maritalstatusname, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, to_char(u.dob, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as dob, u.email, u.mobile , h.feetinches, e.education, o.occupation, r.religionname, c.countryname, st.statename, ct.cityname , u.aboutyou, u.profilepictureid, ca.castename, pd.subcaste, mt.mothertonque, w.weight, pd.bodytype, pd.complexion, pd.physicalstatus , pd.employedin, cu.currency, pd.monthlyincome, pd.food, pd.smoking, pd.drinking, pd.familystatus, pd.familytype, pd.familyvalues, pd.fathersstatus, pd.mothersstatus , pd.numberofbrothers, pd.brothersmarried, pd.numberofsisters, pd.sistersmarried FROM userprofile u JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid JOIN city ct ON ct.id = u.cityid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid LEFT JOIN weight w ON w.id = pd.weightid LEFT JOIN currency cu ON cu.id = pd.currencyid WHERE u.id=:userId and s.statusname = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT p.profilename, u.fullname, g.gendername, date_part('year',age(u.dob)) as age, to_char(u.dob, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as dob, u.email, u.mobile, r.religionname, mt.mothertonque, u.profileid , ms.maritalstatusname, ca.castename, c.countryname, st.statename, ct.cityname, h.feetinches, w.weight, pd.bodytype, pd.complexion, pd.physicalstatus, e.education, o.occupation , pd.employedin, cu.currency, pd.monthlyincome, pd.food, pd.smoking, pd.drinking, pd.familystatus, pd.familytype, pd.familyvalues, u.aboutyou, u.profilepictureid, mb.accepted, mb.id, mb.notinterested , pd.subcaste, pd.fathersstatus, pd.mothersstatus, pd.numberofbrothers, pd.brothersmarried, pd.numberofsisters, pd.sistersmarried, ad.emailcount, ad.mobilecount, m.dontshowalreadyviewed FROM userprofile u JOIN profile p ON p.id = u.userprofileid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid JOIN religion r ON r.id = u.religionid LEFT JOIN personaldetails pd ON pd.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pd.casteid LEFT JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.userid =:userId LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pd.mothertongueid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = u.maritalstatusid JOIN country c ON c.id = u.countryid JOIN state st ON st.id = u.stateid JOIN city ct ON ct.id = u.cityid JOIN height h ON h.id = u.heightid LEFT JOIN weight w ON w.id = pd.weightid JOIN education e ON e.id = u.educationid JOIN occupation o ON o.id = u.occupationid LEFT JOIN currency cu ON cu.id = pd.currencyid JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.userid =:userId AND m.profileid =:userProfileId LEFT JOIN mailbox mb ON mb.userid =:userId AND mb.profileid =:userProfileId WHERE u.id=:profileUserId and s.statusname = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT pd.id, pd.casteid, pd.subcaste, pd.mothertongueid, pd.weightid, pd.bodytype, pd.complexion, pd.physicalstatus , pd.employedin, pd.currencyid, pd.monthlyincome, pd.food, pd.smoking, pd.drinking, pd.familystatus, pd.familytype, pd.familyvalues , pd.fathersstatus, pd.mothersstatus, pd.numberofbrothers, pd.brothersmarried, pd.numberofsisters, pd.sistersmarried, u.religionid FROM personaldetails pd JOIN userprofile u ON u.id = pd.userid JOIN status s ON s.id = pd.statusid WHERE pd.userid=:userId and s.statusname = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT pp.fromage, pp.toage, ms.maritalstatusname, pp.bodytype, pp.complexion, h.feetinches as fromheight, pp.food, r.religionname, ca.castename, mt.mothertonque , e.education, o.occupation, c.countryname, st.statename, ct.cityname, g.gendername, ht.feetinches as toheight, pp.fromheightid, pp.toheightid FROM partnerpreference pp LEFT JOIN religion r ON r.id = pp.religionid LEFT JOIN mothertonque mt ON mt.id = pp.mothertongueid JOIN maritalstatus ms ON ms.id = pp.maritalstatusid LEFT JOIN userprofile u ON u.id = pp.userid JOIN gender g ON g.id = u.genderid LEFT JOIN caste ca ON ca.id = pp.casteid LEFT JOIN country c ON c.id = pp.countryid LEFT JOIN state st ON st.id = pp.stateid LEFT JOIN city ct ON ct.id = pp.cityid LEFT JOIN height h ON h.id = pp.fromheightid LEFT JOIN height ht ON ht.id = pp.toheightid LEFT JOIN education e ON e.id = pp.educationid LEFT JOIN occupation o ON o.id = pp.occupationid JOIN status s ON s.id = pp.statusid WHERE pp.userid=:userId and s.statusname = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT pp.id, pp.fromage, pp.toage, pp.maritalstatusid, pp.bodytype, pp.complexion, pp.fromheightid, pp.food, pp.religionid, pp.casteid, pp.mothertongueid , pp.educationid, pp.occupationid, pp.countryid, pp.stateid, pp.cityid, pp.toheightid FROM partnerpreference pp JOIN status s ON s.id = pp.statusid WHERE pp.userid=:userId and s.statusname = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT * FROM photogallery WHERE createdby=:userId

SELECT pg.id, pg.phototype, pg.filename, ad.showmyprofilepicture FROM photogallery pg JOIN userprofile u ON u.id = pg.createdby JOIN accountdetails ad ON ad.id =:userId WHERE pg.createdby=:userId AND pg.phototype =:profileId
SELECT * FROM userprofile WHERE id=:id
SELECT u.id, u.fullname, u.email, u.mobile, u.roleid, u.statusid, r.rolename, s.statusname, u.profileid FROM userprofile u JOIN role r ON r.id = u.roleid JOIN status s ON s.id = u.statusid

SELECT ad.id, up.planname, up.amount, up.validity, to_char(ad.createddate, 'DD MM YYYY') as createddate, ad.emailcount, ad.mobilecount, ad.videocallcount, up.expressinterest, up.profilehighlight, up.viewprofile, up.protectphoto, up.getsmsalert FROM accountdetails ad JOIN upgradeplandetails up ON up.id = ad.accounttype WHERE ad.userid=:userId
SELECT m.dontshowalreadyviewed, ad.emailcount, ad.mobilecount FROM accountdetails ad LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.userid=:userId AND m.profileid=:profileId WHERE ad.userid=:userId

SELECT pd.id, pd.promocode, to_char(pd.expires, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as expires, pd.discount, pd.email, to_char(pd.sent, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as sent, pd.sentto, s.statusname FROM promotiondetails pd JOIN status s ON s.id = pd.statusid ORDER BY pd.createddate DESC
SELECT ud.emailcount, ud.mobilecount, ud.videocallcount FROM upgradeplandetails ud WHERE ud.id=:planId

SELECT cd.id, cd.planid, ud.planname, cd.plantype, ud.amount, ud.validity, s.statusname FROM cartdetails cd JOIN upgradeplandetails ud ON ud.id = cd.planid JOIN status s ON s.id = cd.statusid WHERE cd.userid=:userId

SELECT pd.id, pd.promocode, to_char(pd.expires, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as expires, pd.discount, pd.email, pd.sent, s.statusname, pd.userid, pd.sentto FROM promotiondetails pd JOIN status s ON s.id = pd.statusid WHERE promocode=:promoCode

update userprofile set userprofileid=:userProfileId, fullname=:fullName , genderid=:genderId, maritalstatusid=:maritalStatusId, dob=:dob, mobile=:mobile, heightid=:heightId, educationid=:educationId, occupationid=:occupationId, religionid=:religionId, cityid=:cityId, stateid=:stateId, countryid=:countryId, aboutyou=:aboutYou, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:id
update userprofile set profileid=:profileId WHERE id=:id

update personaldetails set casteid=:casteId, subcaste=:subCaste, weightid=:weightId, bodytype=:bodyType, complexion=:complexion , physicalstatus=:physicalStatus, employedin=:employedIn, currencyid=:currencyId, monthlyincome=:monthlyIncome, food=:food , smoking=:smoking, drinking=:drinking, familystatus=:familyStatus, familytype=:familyType, familyvalues=:familyValues , fathersstatus=:fathersStatus, mothersstatus=:mothersStatus, numberofbrothers=:numberOfBrothers, brothersmarried=:brothersMarried , numberofsisters=:numberOfSisters, sistersmarried=:sistersMarried, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:id

update partnerpreference set fromage =:fromAge, toage =:toAge, maritalstatusid=:maritalStatusId, bodytype=:bodyType, complexion=:complexion , fromheightid=:fromHeightId, toheightid=:toHeightId, food =:food, religionid =:religionId, casteid=:casteId, mothertongueid =:motherTongueId, educationid=:educationId, occupationid=:occupationId , countryid=:countryId, stateid=:stateId, cityid=:cityId, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:id
update userprofile set profilepictureid=:profilePictureId , updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:userId
update mailbox set read=:readMail , updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId AND profileid =:profileId
update mailbox set accepted=:accepted , updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId AND profileid =:profileId
update mailbox set notinterested=:notInterested , updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId AND profileid =:profileId
update photogallery set orgid=:orgId, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:id
update photogallery set filename=:fileName ,filetype=:fileType, filesize=:fileSize, filepath=:filePath ,updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:id
update userprofile set roleid=:roleId, statusid=:statusId, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:id
update accountdetails set isprofiledeleted=:isProfileDeleted, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId
update roledetails set roleid=:roleId, description=:description, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId
update userprofile set statusid=:statusId, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:userId
update matches set newmatches =:newMatches, whoviewedmyprofile =:whoViewedMyProfile, recentlyviewedprofiles =:recentlyViewedProfiles , updatedby =:updatedBy, updateddate =:updatedDate WHERE id =:id
update matches set shortlistedprofiles=:shortlisted, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:id
update matches set viewedandnotcontacted=:viewedAndNotContacted, sendmail=:sendMail, sendinterested=:sendInterested, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:id
select * from pwreset where resetkey=:resetKey
delete from pwreset where userid=:userId
delete from promotiondetails where id=:id
delete from cartdetails where userid=:userId
update userprofile set password=:password, passwordhash=:passwordHash, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:id

update accountdetails set deactivateprofiledays=:deactivateProfileDays, deactivatedprofiledate=:deactivatedProfileDate, activateprofiledate=:activateProfileDate, isprofileactive=:isProfileActive, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId
update accountdetails set isprofileactive=:isProfileActive, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId
update accountdetails set deleteprofilereason=:deleteProfileReason, isprofiledeleted=:isProfileDeleted, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId
update accountdetails set showmyprofilepicture=:showmyProfilepicture, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId
update promotiondetails set email=:emailTo, sent=:sentDate, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE promocode=:promoCode
update promotiondetails set userid=:userId, profileid=:profileId, accepted=:acceptedDate, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE promocode=:acceptedPromoCode
update cartdetails set planid=:planId, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:id

update accountdetails set accounttype=:accountType, emailcount=:emailCount, mobilecount=:mobileCount, videocallcount=:videocallCount , transactionid=:txnId, transactionstatus=:txnStatus, createddate=:createdDate, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId
update accountdetails set emailcount=:emailCount, mobilecount=:mobileCount, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId
update matches set dontshowalreadyviewed=:dontshowalreadyviewed, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId AND profileid=:profileId
update accountdetails set verifymobilenumber=:verifyCode, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId
update userprofile set mobile=:mobile, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE id=:userId
update accountdetails set verifyedmobilenumber=:verifyedMobileNumber, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId
update accountdetails set verifymobilenumber=:verifyCode, verifyedmobilenumber=:verifyedMobileNumber, updatedby=:updatedBy, updateddate=:updatedDate WHERE userid=:userId
